channel.title: Thoughts on a f2P/P2P Multi-worlds Server? PLEASE VIEW THIS!
channel.description:
[center]Well today I have been having a discussion with my friend about starting a new server. We have came up with loads of ideas.
Our best idea was to do a multiple world server that could either be like a 2006 remake, or a newer version, as we are still undecided about which.[/center]
[b]World 1-[/b] [u]F2P[/u]
[i]This world would have the free to play element to it, where all 'members objects' come with with 'member's object' when you hover over them. There will be no members mini-games (eg-pest control, castle wars, etc..) but will obviously still have the duel arena. The wildy will become full with rune scim pures, green d'hide pures, etc.
Members will still be able to access this world, but all members objects become 'un-usable', this will just sit in the inventory as 'members object' etc.[/i]
[b]World 2-[/b] [u]P2P[/u]
[i]Then we could have a P2P world which would cost like 3.00 GBP a month or around that mark, then have deals on if you buy more then one months subscription. This will obviously have everything unlocked, eg- dragon, black d'hides, mini-games, all skills etc..[/i][u][b]We was just wanting your feedback on this. Could you please copy and paste this and fill in the answers::[/b][/u]
1) Do you think this is a good idea and give reasons for this?
2) Do you think it should be based on a earlier year so theres no items such as 'dragon claws' (even when in members world) etc..?
3) Can you give us anything that you think could improve this idea?
..
Many thanks in advance, Lee.

item.title: Thoughts on a f2P/P2P Multi-worlds Server? PLEASE VIEW THIS!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. No
  • This sounds like a 2006 runescape remake
  • There are already several runescape remakes that offer free membership

  1. Base it on the 474 or 459 era

  2. If you want to stick with the idea of two servers, make a PK server and a normal economy server. Otherwise just don’t. It won’t turn out well trust me. Try getting your player base up to 100+ then releasing the second ‘world’. Why have two worlds with 15 players?

Read full topic
item.source: Thoughts on a f2P/P2P Multi-worlds Server? PLEASE VIEW THIS!

item.title: Thoughts on a f2P/P2P Multi-worlds Server? PLEASE VIEW THIS!
item.dc:creator: @Ljelvin Ljelvin
item.description:
@Ljelvin wrote:

[center]Well today I have been having a discussion with my friend about starting a new server. We have came up with loads of ideas.

Our best idea was to do a multiple world server that could either be like a 2006 remake, or a newer version, as we are still undecided about which.[/center]

World 1-
F2P

[i]This world would have the free to play element to it, where all ‘members objects’ come with with ‘member’s object’ when you hover over them. There will be no members mini-games (eg-pest control, castle wars, etc…) but will obviously still have the duel arena. The wildy will become full with rune scim pures, green d’hide pures, etc.

Members will still be able to access this world, but all members objects become ‘un-usable’, this will just sit in the inventory as ‘members object’ etc.[/i]

World 2-
P2P

Then we could have a P2P world which would cost like 3.00 GBP a month or around that mark, then have deals on if you buy more then one months subscription. This will obviously have everything unlocked, eg- dragon, black d’hides, mini-games, all skills etc…We was just wanting your feedback on this. Could you please copy and paste this and fill in the answers::

  1. Do you think this is a good idea and give reasons for this?

  2. Do you think it should be based on a earlier year so theres no items such as ‘dragon claws’ (even when in members world) etc…?

  3. Can you give us anything that you think could improve this idea?

…

Many thanks in advance,
Lee.

Read full topic
